welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Franklin Square, where charm and history come together to create a truly unique destination. Enjoy our quaint shops, delicious cuisine, and beautiful parks as you explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: International flights for major airlines such as Air France and Japan Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Mainly Delta Air Lines domestic flights

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: One of the largest terminals, serving both domestic and international flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: JetBlue's main terminal

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Home to British Airways and other international airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: American Airlines' main terminal

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving mostly regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The main terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving mostly Delta Air Lines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Westchester County Apt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic and some international flights, including United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic and some international flights, including United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to regional airlines and provides a more streamlined travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
